name: Magneto Demo
description:
Magneto Demo is a sandbox game where you play as Magneto. You can levitate, pickup, and throw metal objects.

Hold down W to levitate. Hit Spacebar simultaneously with W to levitate straight up. RMB to pickup metal objects, LMB to throw metal objects.

The screen will be black while loading the game. Press Escape to exit.

Special thanks to ncmako.
